content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-06-03 #25390 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.
@Kim Morrison @Anne Baanen Can you please take a look at the lakefile? At least it's downgrading ProofWidgets, which we probably don't want.
Yes, looks like the branch created early this morning did not yet contain the proofwidgets update, so it wanted to revert what I did later in the morning. Should be fixed now.
Ok, please go ahead and merge when it's appropriate in the release process.
